paragraph_1.part_2: years of Front-end experience, with a specialization in creating, debugging, and optimizing web applications. My main focus revolves around the use of React (and consequently HTML, CSS, and JavaScript) and complementary technologies that integrate effectively. Additionally, I ensure special attention to SEO in all my projects and maintain a constant update of my knowledge.

about.paragraph_2: In addition to my technical skills, I possess leadership, decision-making, and meticulous attention to detail. My ability to communicate in English is fluent, as in my current job, I need to interact with teams in India who use this language.

falabella.name: Falabella.com
falabella.description: Developed an internal web application for A/B testing, improving the design with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I maintain the code in React, adding features, fixing bugs, and writing tests. I coordinate with external teams to maintain and integrate their features and APIs. My role spans from the development and continuous improvement of web design to effective code management and collaboration with third parties for successful integration.

freelance.name: Freelance
freelance.description: Develop websites that provide detailed information about the company's products, ensuring effective presentation and intuitive navigation. I focus my design on aesthetics to attract customers, creating attractive and user-friendly interfaces. Additionally, I implement robust search engine optimization (SEO) strategies to improve the online visibility of the company. My approach covers everything from site programming to aesthetics and optimization, ensuring a complete and positive user experience.

paideia.name: Paideia School
paideia.description: Developed an application that automates the creation and grading of evaluations, helping teachers avoid additional work outside their working hours.

schools.name: Various schools and Universidad San Sebastian
schools.description: Facilitated teaching problem-solving through programming languages, promoting a comprehensive understanding of effective solution strategies. Additionally, I coordinated teaching staff to develop activities that facilitated the achievement of learning objectives by students. My educational focus was on equipping students with practical programming skills and fostering collaboration among teaching staff to ensure a comprehensive and successful learning experience.

ba_tester.name: BA Tester
ba_tester.desciption: Web application that allows implementing A/B tests on any webpage by collecting tests from developers and making a package available through an endpoint.

pdf_constructor.name: PDF Constructor
pdf_constructor.description: It is a web page that receives user-uploaded images, configures them to their liking, and finally generates a PDF file saved on the user's computer. The entire process occurs on the Front-end side.

tst_maker.name: tst_maker
tst_maker.description: Desktop application that builds multiple-choice math assessments for secondary level schools in Chile.
